title: Is this the job for me: Jack of what trade
brief_description: This film is intended as a guide to young people of school leaving age who are faced with the problem of choosing a career. The film is a dramatised account of a school visit by a Youth Employment Officer, and his subsequent discussion with students and visits to industry. Suggests self-analysis by students to assess their special talents, interests, dispositions and physique in terms of their future employment.
